{{post.title}}

import {Component, OnInit} from "@angular/core"; import {PostService} from "./post.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit{ title = 'installPackages'; postArry; constructor(private postService: PostService) { } public ngOnInit(): void { this.postService.getPost().subscribe( res => this.postArry = res ) } }
